item.title: Catherine Zeta-Jones Unpacks Wednesday and Morticia’s Strained Relationship as She Looks Ahead to Season 3
item.description: The actress who plays the matriarch of the Addams Family in the hit Netflix series explains why “some secrets should be left secret,” but “little white lie secrets should be exposed.”
